attributes.action: Create alcohol disorder / medical fee to cover cost of alcohol misuse - reduce tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Punish the people who misuse alcohol by introducing a set fine where police are required and where medical treatment is required.

This fine can be introduced for individual and establishment (in exchange for lower taxes). 

This will allow the government to obtain the funds needed to deal with alcohol misuse and to be a deterant to misuse rather than a hit all tax

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
